song_name: Waiting For A Girl Like You
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Waiting For A Girl Like You has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Waiting For A Girl Like You has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♭ Major,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
